entry.title: Batfamily Acidemia
entry.summary:
Author: Don454132Nie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,201Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 112

Summary: Batman and his Batfamily(Nightwing/Dick Grayson, Batgirl/Barbra Gordon, Red Hood/Jason Todd, Robin/Damian Wayne, and Harley Quinn/Harleen Quinnzel) all go to stop the Joker and his associates who are using a device given to them by Jokers acquaintance Lex Luthor which zaps the group to the world of My Hero Academia. now they must try to find a way home while also capturing all their villains now in the world of MHA while also helping the hero's of this world deal with their own villain's like the LOV.

entry.title: This is What You Get
entry.summary:
Author: sagsunandmoon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,779Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 88

Summary: title from karma police by radiohead-“I’ve gotta say Nighty-Night, you acrobat types are always so hard to catch! Twisting and flipping around, defying the laws of physics as they stand. But look at you now! Suspended and hanging like some sad, damaged puppet. Don’t worry though! I won’t let you get bored up there, we’re going to have so much fun together.”“Do- the theatrics… ever stop with you?” Dick manages to choke out, lifting his head slightly to show that he’s alert, that he’s not some broken puppet.“Well of course not! It’s just so exciting that you’re here. It feels like deja vu really. I can’t believe I get to do this twice, different bird, same cage. Tell me pretty boy, do you prefer the crowbar or should I change it up this time around?”-or dick is kidnapped by the joker and the batfam has to come and save him-my knowledge of these characters comes from YJ, arkham games, and fanfic, not comics. :) be nice pls

entry.title: Of Capes and Cowls (and Coats)
entry.summary:
Author: TheStoryTeller_with_an_Eyepatch

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,858Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 35

Summary: After the events of Trimax, Vash's sisters think their little brother needs a change of scenery.A few universes and almost a thousand years in the past, Gotham's narrows experiences a supernatural power surge that had the potential to blackout the entire city.Gotham's Bat is watching, and our favorite Typhoon finds that a brand new world means brand new problems and brand new people to save.

entry.title: Just go along.
entry.summary:
Author: Sandra_Cisne

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,194Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 624

entry.title: The Heroes I Raised
entry.summary:
Author: Sweet_Ru07

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,744Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 42

Summary: when a new magical threat arrives in Gotham, all it's heroes gather to confront it despite their strained relationship with one another. however, despite their best efforts, tragedy strikes. And Bruce Wayne, surrounded by the bodies of his children, is given a chance to try again. with his dying breath he vows, he will do better, no matter what it takes, he will save them this time.This fic is inspired by the webtoon "The S-Classes Raised" but does not require prior knowledge of it, this is my first time writing for these characters and I accept any constructive criticisms. will update the tags as I go

entry.title: Everything for family
entry.summary:
Author: wolfthunder7

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,589Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 32

entry.title: Batfamily Shenanigans Throughout The Years
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene_0

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,151Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 348

Summary: This is a collection of mostly fluff one-shots of the bat family. They're sweet, crazy, chaotic, and some nice stories to read while tired. The first chapter is a thousand and a bit words and is based around the young Batman au, where the league discovers how young Bruce really is. It also centers around some Bruce and Dick fluff where he's an actual good parent. The second chapter is Robin!Dick meeting the J.L. and I wrote it at like 3 am so I don't even know how long it is. The third chapter is a lovely, light angst and comfort fic about Bruce telling sleepy Dick a memory from his childhood. The fourth is a short fic based on Clark Kent talking with Brucie Wayne. The fifth chapter is an extremely cute fic about Dick making Bruce a card for Father's day. The sixth one if Dick's journey home after a mission with Flash and Green Lantern and Brucie Wayne dealing with the consequences of being crazy Brucie Wayne.I'll be updating the tags and the summary as I go.

entry.title: Family Crisis
entry.summary:
Author: librarylexicon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 93,853Chapters: 25/27Kudos: 351

Summary: It was only after he had ended the call, in the small clinic room beside the sleeping Stephanie, that he pulled back the cowl and allowed himself to breathe. Alive, he thought, and the hope contained in that single word overwhelmed him until his throat grew thick and his eyes stung with unshed tears. Alive. At the close of the gang war, Batman uncovers an attempted deception concerning the life of his former protégé Stephanie Brown, and suddenly nothing is as important as his family. While Dick seeks absolution, Tim struggles with grief, Cassandra searches for belonging and Steph rebuilds her sense of self, Bruce faces the return of ghosts from his own past and psyche. (War Games AU)OR: Remember when Steph “died” and the Batfamily all went their separate ways as a result? In this world, that never happened, but the road to recovery after Blockbuster’s death and the gang war’s fallout is still far from smooth.

entry.title: What Was I Made For?
entry.summary:
Author: The_Pink_Fox

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 326,248Chapters: 65/?Kudos: 1,821

entry.title: To be a hero
entry.summary:
Author: Savage_vigilante

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,847Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Being a hero doesn’t always mean taking down the bad guys or saving the world. Sometimes being a hero means helping people when they need it the most, and the bat family is no exception.This is a collection of one shots, following different members of the bat family as they try in their own ways to put a little good in the world.

entry.title: The (Adoption) Odyssey
entry.summary:
Author: Megaerakles

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,902Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 269

Summary: All King Bruce of Gothika wants to do is to return home to his wife and infant son after being forced to go off to war. And bring along this demigod kid he found while they besieged the demon city. Oh, and the plucky orphan he picked up on the Isle of the Lotus Eaters. And the shapeshifter boy who'd been living as a lamb in the cyclop's den. And—well, you get the picture. Good thing he and Talia had always wanted a large family!

entry.title: The Justice League Awards Night
entry.summary:
Author: lemonlimemadness

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,259Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 1,369

Summary: Clark calls it ‘teambuilding.’ Bruce calls it a ‘waste of time.’ Bruce is expecting ‘Most people saved’, ‘Most popular hero’, ‘Best costume design’, etcetera, etcetera, other standard-type awards, official sounding ones with corresponding gilded trophies, the kind handed over after large disasters requiring large amounts of aid. He reclines in his chair, fully expecting to be disappointed. Which is why Bruce is not expecting the words, ‘Best Thirst-trapper’ to show up on the screen. The Justice League holds a mock-awards night. As expected, everyone goes insane about it. Based on Alpharad’s youtube video I Hosted an Awards Show for Friends who don't deserve any
